ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] haste & roleplay
ygData.msgSnippet: Roleplay is pretty much the same as /anonymous but your guildtag still shows up. ... _________________________________________________________________________
ygData.messageBody:
Roleplay is pretty much the same as /anonymous but your guildtag still shows
up.

>role-playing angle? I turned mine on until my guild requested I turn it
>off. But I didn't notice any difference. Is there?
>
>Batleth
>14 LVL Kick A$$ ShadowKnight
